entries.name: Age
entries: Humans reach adulthood in their late teens and live less than a century.

entries.name: Alignment
entries: Aiwenorians venerate knowledge, and wish to preserve it. This leads them to tend towards lawful alignments.

entries.name: Size
entries: Aiwenor Humans vary widely in height and build, from barely 5 feet to well over 6 feet tall. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Medium.

entries.name: Language
entries: You can speak, read, and write Aiwenorian, and either High or Low Common.

entries.name: Human Adaptability
entries: You have proficiency in one skill of your choice, and gain one feat of your choice.

entries.name: The Lore of Aiwenor
entries: You have been taught much about the magical lore of Haltarac. You have proficiency in the {@skill Arcana} skill, and advantage on {@skill History} and {@skill Investigation} checks regarding magic lore or items.
